summary.para: Gets the automatic content group(s) from the content group map.

param.name: automaticGroupsEnumerator
param.para: An enumerator for the automatic content group(s).

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the required content group from the content group map.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets information about a content group map.
